name: Portfolio Website
description: A fully custom personal portfolio built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. Features smooth scroll animations, typing effect, responsive navbar, and dynamic project rendering from a JSON file.

name: Zauq-App
description: Built a responsive audio player inspired by Spotify. Added customizations like Islamic nasheed content, UI styling, and additional playback features. Helped strengthen understanding of DOM, audio API, and dynamic content rendering.

name: CourierBox
description: A full-stack courier booking and tracking system built with the MERN stack. Users can regsiter, log-in/log-out, book parcels and track delivery; admins manage and update parcel status through a secure dashboard.

name: TaskEase
description: Django-based service finder app to hire helpers (maids, drivers, guards) by category and location. Includes user profiles registering, log-in/out, and an admin dashboard for managing listings.

name: MovieApp
description: A Django-based entertainment platform where users can view movies, read about celebrities, subscribe, log in/out, and comment on blogs. Includes user authentication and blog interaction features.
